Faq.title: How do I contact Customer Service?
Faq.description: If you have any questions or problems using Samelogic feel free to reach out to any one of our team members. Amanda (amanda@samelogic.com), Dwayne (dwayne@samelogic.com) or Shawn (shawn@samelogic.com). You can also call us at +1 (650) 235 6537.

Faq.title: Does this work for mobile apps?
Faq.description: We have plans to make this available on iOS and Android in the near future. For now, it only works on websites. Please speak with Dwayne (dwayne@samelogic.com) if this is something you urgently need.

Faq.title: What tools do you integrate with?
Faq.description: We are open to integrating with which ever product you need. Please reach out to Shawn (shawn@samelogic.com) to let us know what tools you want us to integrate with.

Service.description: Client Satisfaction is our first priority and We are best at it .Keep In Touch.

Service.description: A Dedicated support team is always ready to provide best support to our customers.

Testimonial.name: Jon Doe
Testimonial.comment: Love to work with this designer in every our future project to ensure we are going to build best prototyping features.

Testimonial.name: Roman Ul Oman
Testimonial.comment: Impressed with master class support of the team and really look forward for the future. A true passionate team.

MONTHLY_PRICING_TABLE.name: Standard Product Feedback
MONTHLY_PRICING_TABLE.description: Finally understand how to increase product stickiness and retention with meaningful, actionable feedback.

listItems.content: Turn your product into a live interactive canvas for customer feedback
Easily understand user behaviour with a combination of qual + quant
No dependence on engineers to build out custom features for feedback
